alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 08 at 11:21AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Southern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 1121 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen and additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Daphne, Fairhope, Foley, Spanish Fort, Robertsdale, Point Clear, Loxley, Magnolia Springs, Summerdale, Silverhill, Rosinton, Clay City, Marlow, Belforest, River Park, Elsanor, Malbis, Steelwood, Montrose and Turkey Branch.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
